plot: Michael tells Gob about his flirtation with Marta. Meanwhile, George-Michael tries to determine whether he and Maeby are related by blood.

After Tobias moves into his room, George Michael gets a rather curious tip about his cousin's origins, so he decides to investigate. Gob, worried about his girlfriend Marta, heads down to the TV studio to visit the set of her show, to confront a man named "Hermano".—halo1k
